channel.title: Godwars help [508]
channel.description:
Hi, I have been trying to add a way to determin if a player is in godwars so it will show the killcount interface, i came to a conclusion that using a public int would be best,
I have added [code] public int ingwd = 0; //player is in GWD[/code] but i don't know how i could make it so if [code] public int ingwd = 1; //player is in GWD[/code] the godwars interface would show up. :/
help please
thanks

item.title: Godwars help [508]
